original_title: ホロ酔いの情事 秘め事は神頼み
overview: An erotic drama in which the director Tetsuya Takehora, the scriptwriter Hiroko Fukazawa, and the starring Nanami Kawakami have reunited. Miwa, a communicative disorder, spends her days hiding behind the offering box at the shrine and soaking in sake while keeping a distance from the world. One day, she meets a middle-aged man who came to visit a shrine, and she is attracted to each other as she talks without showing up to the other person. Miwa began to feel confident in living through interaction with him ...
title: Horo-yoi no jôji: Himegoto wa kamidanomi
